content_fields.desc: **Required.** The ID of the call this event relates to.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** Array of objects describing the candidates.
content_fields.title: [Candidate]

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The version of the VoIP specification this messages adheres to. This specification is version 0.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The SDP media type this candidate is intended for.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The index of the SDP 'm' line this candidate is intended for.
content_fields.title: number

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The SDP 'a' line of the candidate.
content_fields.title: string

desc: This event is sent by callers after sending an invite and by the callee after answering. Its purpose is to give the other party additional ICE candidates to try using to communicate.
